data.name: Enchantress
data.detailed_description:
Enchantress follows Twyla's experience struggling to run a jewellery shop when she suddenly discovers the power to enchant the jewellery she creates with the emotions of her customers.
Craft all kinds of jewellery, engage in deep conversation with a range of characters, and coax out their true feelings to create the perfect sentimental gift.

A UNIQUE WORLD

In the world of Enchantress, emotions have possessed a special energy for as long as we remember - an energy called Paeos. If we don't keep our Paeos under control, anything could happen. An overwhelming joy could cause a field of flowers to bloom! ...But an intense anger could burn down forests.

Because of this, in Twyla's city of Zenoa, people regulate their emotions so cautiously, that emotional expression has become stigmatised. And those who struggle to keep their feelings from growing out of control are shamed by the community.

A COMING-OF-AGE STORY

Our story sees Twyla at the wrong end of society, unable to keep her emotions in line after her mother's passing has left her lost and lonely. Until suddenly, a mysterious hooded man barges into her store, with a stern look in his eyes. But even he knows nothing of how Twyla's jewellery will flip their lives upside down.

Play as Twyla in this fantastical coming-of-age adventure as she revitalises her store and herself, and works to decipher the emotional plight of her people, one customer at a time.

data.short_description: Enchantress is a visual-novel where you play as Twyla, a young jeweller who discovers she has the ability to enchant her creations with the energy of her customersâ€™ emotions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
